properties.displayName: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity Invoking Sys File
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "rundll32.exe" and (ProcessCommandLine contains ".sys," or ProcessCommandLine contains ".sys ")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452
